result.title: Data Management Plan 1st release
result.description: The Data Management Plan will provide an analysis of the main elements of the data management policy that will be used by with regard to research data that will be generated by the project SOCIOBEE participates in the Pilot on Open Research Data in Horizon 2020 to improve and maximise access to and reuse of research data generated by actions This deliverable will outline how data will be handled during and after the project period The DMP will include i Reference and name of the data set as well as the organisation in charge including contact details ii Description of the data set origin nature utility etc iii Standards and metadata iv Data exchange access procedures v Archiving and preservation longterm preservation procedures v A list of the software tools envisaged to be used during the project for research purposes and justification vi The data security protocol including organisational and technological measures vii Brief overview of the data protection legal requirements including the contacts of the partners designated Data Protection Officers DPO or in case there is no designated DPO the organisations data protection policy The DMP is an output of Task 13This is the first version of the DMP will be delivered in M6 with partial input from D31 and will evolve during the project updates in month M20 and M36
